mapper.select: select sm.id, sm.parent_id, sm.type, sm.title, sm.auth_code, sm.path, sm.active_path, sm.icon, sm.active_icon, sm.component, sm.name, sm.link_src, sm.badge_type, sm.badge, sm.badge_variants, sm.keep_alive, sm.affix_tab, sm.hide_in_menu, sm.hide_children_in_menu, sm.hide_in_breadcrumb, sm.hide_in_tab, sm.order_no from sys_menu sm left join sys_role_menu srm on srm.menu_id = sm.id where srm.role_id = #{roleId} and sm.status = #{status} order by sm.order_no
